action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi All,

I can confirm that with Heath's updated tagging methods and the pdwise adjustments to automations to accommodate that in the last 48 hours all is running smoothly. Furthermore, I can confirm that I have personally tested this on several emails, tags are firing and opportunities are also being auto-created which is all correct.

Thanks for your patience while we ensured the new website/forms integrated and worked well with pdwise.

Regards,
Dimitri

Dimitri Galanis

Director & Strategist

dimitri@pointdot.com.au

02 9171 4990

0419 707 061

106 Homer Street, Earlwood

pointdot.com.au
Ok great, thank you, I will work with Dimitri's team to check that automation. Either Dimitri or I will confirm once it's up and running.

HI Heath,
This is correct, everything needs to be placed within opportunity, if not we do not see it.

Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Sales & Marketing Manager
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

T: 0461422 666
E: renee@littlescribblers.com.au
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Renee,

My test submissions are still there, if you go to the 'Contacts' view you will see them.

I'm guessing the parent was Jannat Ria? We have 2 Belmore locations in the system, this is for Benaroon Rd: https://app.pdwise.com.au/v2/location/aQ0U1qG5hj0s3m4hnvPd/contacts/detail/Akdw9Vc98b89w2prcbWh

The feed into the CRM is working, it looks like the automation to move the contact into an 'Opportunity' is what you are needing to happen? Is that correct?

Hi Heath,
I did not have any leads come through on my end or did you delete them in the CRM?

Customer was completing it for Belmore

Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Sales & Marketing Manager
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

T: 0461422 666
E: renee@littlescribblers.com.au
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Renee,

I have gone through and tested the 7 locations:

  1. Mooroolbark 1
  2. Cleary Ave
  3. Benaroon Rd
  4. Brookvale
  5. Caringbah
  6. Ashfield
  7. Beaconsfield

They all landing in the CRM, see attached screenshot. Is it possible that they were submitting to one of the other campuses? I.e:

  • Peakhurst, Belmore Rd
  • Peakhurst, Bonds Rd; or
  • Sutherland

If so, we have programmed submissions for those campuses to not land in the CRM. Let me know?

Hi Renee,

Thanks for sending this through. We are investigating, but in order for us to be as prompt as possible, the more detail you can provide the better. Without the detail we have to conduct 'best guesses' and manual submissions and to determine what the user may have entered and experienced.

In this case, if you can supply the parents name or email and ideally which campus they were enquiring about, we can pin point their issue. Even the test details that Katerina used would be beneficial as there aren't any submissions from today that are clearly Katerina's.

I hope this makes sense. We will keep looking in the meantime.

Begin forwarded message:

From: Enrol Little Scribblers <enrol@littlescribblers.com.au>
Subject: Issue with enquiry form
Date: 8 July 2024 at 1:25:50 PM AEST
To: Renee Eyles <renee@littlescribblers.com.au>

Hi,

I hope this message finds you well.

I wanted to bring to your attention an issue I encountered with the enquiry form on our website. A parent recently attempted to submit the form, and although the website indicated that it had been successfully submitted, I did not receive the parent inquiry in our CRM system.

To further investigate, I also tested the form myself by filling it out and submitting it, but unfortunately, I did not observe any parent enquiry appearing in the CRM either.

Could you please look into this matter at your earliest convenience? It seems there may be a technical issue affecting the proper receipt of submissions from the enquiry form.

Thank you.

--
Kind regards,

Katerina Konjarski
Enrolments Consultant
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

M: 1300 300 011
E: enrol@littlescribblers.com.au
